title: Woe
content:
le

The gentle tap-tap-tap of a staff on one sparked terror for all in Cazador's palace. It signalled an approaching storm,and all they could do was shrink into the background and pray its wrath would not fall on them.

Quarterstaff Versatile

Woe is one of the Quarterstaves in Baldur's Gate 3. Woe is a quearterstaff that players can obtain after interrupting Cazador's ritual. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.). Char
